alert.note: Alert for Eastern Putnam; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 6:33PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Putnam County through 715 PM EDT... At 633 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bardin, or near Palatka, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Interlachen, East Palatka, Melrose, George`s Lake, Florahome, Bostwick, Melrose Landing, Federal Point and Orange Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
